title: Random Ban?
body: I would like to ask why my account is banned? I haven't done anything that could be called "toxic" and in my past 20 games I've actually been honored quite a few times. So no recent history or any history of my past games have I done anything to break the guidelines that would result in a ban. I was logging into today and without and type of warning I was banned permanently. It said I would receive an e-mail as to why I was banned but I was not sent an e-mail. So I was wondering could you help me fix this or inform me why I was banned and how I caused it?  I haven't done anything that I recall that would result in a permanent ban, especially one without warning.

replies.body: You should send a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and ask why you were banned.

There was some suspicious activity going on with the account that might have been signs that it was compromised. Hit up the account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you can, and after verifying that you created the account they should be able to help out.
